amendment.description: Amendment requires the CIA and the FBI to jointly prepare an annual report on the intelligence activities of the People's Republic of China and most specifically, those directed against or affecting the interests of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of July 8, 1997 to require the Directors of the CIA and FBI to report annually to Congress on the intelligence activities undertaken by the People's Republic of China that affect U.S. interests.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
